title: Kuzu de Baka ni wa Nido to Awanai
original_name: クズでバカには二度と会わない
sinopse:
Minami Yuuya meets an old friend from High School, Suzuka Sougo during a job request. Suzuka Sougo agrees, but at what cost?? Will the old feelings that Minami had come back, or will he be forced into blackmail? How long will these two HATE each other…

(Source: Fujoshi Bitches)
